articles.title: Paper gets $100M worth of venture-backed paper for B2B edtech

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Royal Bank of Canada adds former indigenous charity head to board - Reuters
articles.description: Royal Bank of Canada (RY.TO), the country's largest lender, added Roberta Jamieson, former chief executive officer of indigenous charity Indspire, to its board on Wednesday.

articles.author: Maha Dahan,Imad Creidi
articles.title: School's out for good? Lebanese teachers flee as financial crisis builds - Reuters
articles.description: Sorbonne-educated Chryssoula Fayad spent nearly two decades teaching history and geography at Lebanon's elite French schools, ultimately heading departments. Now she is a substitute teacher in Paris, part of an exodus from an education system on its knees.
articles.content: An empty classroom is pictured at College des Freres Sacre-Coeur in Beirut, Lebanon, June 25, 2021. REUTERS/Mohamed AzakirBEIRUT, July 8 (Reuters) - Sorbonne-educated Chryssoula Fayad spent nearly tw… [+4751 chars]
